height.description: Measure from the top of the head to the soles of the feet while standing erect without shoes.

chest.description: Measure the circumference horizontally around the body at the fullest part of the chest, ensuring the tape is parallel to the floor.

bust.description: Measure the circumference horizontally around the body under the arms, across the nipples, and parallel to the floor.

waist.description: Measure the circumference horizontally around the body at the natural waist level (usually the narrowest part of the torso).

hip.description: Measure the maximum hip circumference at the hip level and parallel to the floor.

waist_to_hip.description: Measure the vertical distance from the natural waistline to the fullest part of the hip.

bust_height.description: Measure from the Shoulder neck point to the bust point

breast_distance.description: Measure the horizontal distance between the nipples.

bust_radius.description: Measure the distance from the bust point to the underbust line

shoulde_to_underbust.description: Measure from the Shoulder neck point to the underbust line line passing over the bust

front_waist_length.description: Measure from the Shoulder neck point to the front waist line passing over the bust

back_waist_length.description: Measure from the cervicale (base of the neck) following the contour of the spinal column to the center back waist level.

back_width.description: Measure across the back from one armhole crease to the other while standing erect with the arms hanging down.

back_shoulder.description: Measure across the back from one shoulder joint to the other while standing erect with the arms hanging down.

armhole.description: Measure from the shoulder joint down through the front-break point, the armpit, up to the back-break point, and up to the starting point.

top_arm.description: Measure the maximum upper arm circumference parallel to the floor between the shoulder joint and the elbow.

round_elbow.description: Measure the circumference around the elbow.

wrist.description: Measure the circumference around the widest part of the wrist.

hand_entry.description: Measure the circumference around the widest part of the hand, excluding the thumb.

elbow_length.description: Measure from the shoulder joint to the elbow.

sleeve_length.description: Measure from the shoulder joint to the desired end of the sleeve (e.g., wrist or elbow).

dress_knee_length.description: Measure from the Shoulder neck point to the knee passing over the bust

dress_full_length.description: Measure from the Shoulder neck point to the floor / ankle passing over the bust

skirt_knee_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the knee point

skirt_full_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the floor / ankle

neck_to_sweetheart_front.description: Measure from the center front neck base line to the lowest point of the sweetheart neckline.

neck_to_sweetheart_back.description: Measure from the center back neck base line to the lowest point of the preferred neckline.

round_neck_cm.description: Measure the circumference around the base of the neck.

flare_out_cm.description: Measure from the waistline to above knee level where you prefer your mermaid flare to originate from

walking_step.description: Walking taking a small step, measure around the flare out point. This is to allow for adequate room for walking

trouser_waist.description: Measure the circumference around the natural waist level for trousers.

trouser_hip.description: Measure the maximum hip circumference at the hip level and parallel to the floor.

trouser_waist_to_hip.description: Measure the vertical distance from the natural waistline to the fullest part of the hip.

body_rise.description: While sitting upright on a chair, measure from the waistline to the seat of the chair

outseam.description: Measure from the top of the waistband to the bottom of the leg opening on the outside of the leg.

inseam.description: Measure from the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg opening on the inside of the leg.

pant_full_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the Floor / Preferred length

pant_knee_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the knee point

pant_calf_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the calf

pant_ankle_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the ankle / floor

pant_high_ankle_length.description: Measure from the waist line to the highest part of the ankle bone

round_thigh.description: Measure the circumference around the widest part of the thigh.

round_knee.description: Measure the circumference around the knee.

round_calf.description: Measure the circumference around the calf at its widest point.

round_high_ankle.description: Measure the circumference around the highest part of the ankle bone.

round_ankle.description: Measure the circumference around the ankle.

foot_entry.description: Measure the circumference around the widest part of the foot.
